sentences.english: Over 4,000 men who had sailed aboard Yamato and its escorts were dead.
sentences.chinese: 大和号及其护航舰上超过4000名船员阵亡。

sentences.english: FC-Glad we could help. What happened to your escort?
sentences.chinese: 很高兴能帮助你们。你们的护航舰队怎么了？

sentences.english: China provides military gear, including fighter jets and frigates.
sentences.chinese: 中国提供了军事装备，包括战斗机和护航舰。

sentences.english: He is the commander in chief of this escort , and he holds great power.
sentences.chinese: 他是这艘护航舰的总指挥，权利很大。

sentences.english: A convoy was hit by gunfire.
sentences.chinese: 一支护航舰队被炮火击中。

sentences.english: A frigate was struck by a torpedo.
sentences.chinese: 有一艘护航舰被鱼雷击中。

sentences.english: The partisans lay up by day and by night sallied out to attack convoys.
sentences.chinese: 游击队白天隐蔽起来，夜晚出动袭击敌人的护航舰队。

sentences.english: New pattern running anti-convoy torpedoes were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 设计出了新型的流线型反护航舰队鱼雷。

sentences.english: One cannot fault China for sending destroyers to East African waters to protect its merchant fleet.
sentences.chinese: 没人能说中国向非洲东海岸派出护航舰队有什么不对。

definition: battle group/naval formation headed by an aircraft carrier
